entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow beginning overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Risk of snow squalls in the morning and early in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
